Navigation
Name Rascal/Libraries/util/Resources/getProject
Synopsis Retrieve the hierarchical representation of a single named project.
Function Resource getProject(loc project)
Examples 
rascal>import util::Resources;
ok
rascal>getProject(|project://org.eclipse.imp.pdb.values|);
Resource: project(
  |project://org.eclipse.imp.pdb.values|,
  {
    folder(
      |project://org.eclipse.imp.pdb.values/.settings|,
      {
        file(|project://org.eclipse.imp.pdb.values/.settings/org.eclipse.core.resources.prefs|),

      }),
    file(|project://org.eclipse.imp.pdb.values/pom.xml|),
    folder(
      |project://org.eclipse.imp.pdb.values/target|,
      {
        folder(
          |project://org.eclipse.imp.pdb.values/target/classes|,
          {
            folder(

              }),
